page.title: 01Shops in Gorleston.
page.content: The main shopping area lies along the High Street. There are four fairly small supermarkets, a range of specialist shops and a small shopping precinct where a former store has been converted to a number of shop units. The largest supermarket, Fine Fare has plans to rebuild on a much larger site to the east of the High Street, using an old factory area on the reclaimed marshes next to the river. It's present site is confined and access is difficult, the new site will provide some 200 parking places. Local opinion is divided as to whether this will take trade from the present shopping areas, or make it more attractive by drawing trade from Yarmouth and Lowestoft. Another shopping area extends along Bells Road.
